errorMsg_empty: You need to first open a document or click within the document where you want to insert
errorMsg_miss: There are no child documents under the current document
dclike: After deleting, please do not click too quickly
noneId: The document ID was not obtained and the button is disabled. You need to first open a document or click on the document that needs to be inserted
hadId: Document ID has been obtained, you can click the button
errorMsg_miss_outline: There is no outline under the current document

depth.title: Index depth
depth.content: Set the Index depth. If set to 0 , there will be no limitation

fold.title: Index fold
fold.content: Set the Index fold. If set to 0 , there will be no limitation.To save the manually modified folding state, automatic updates need to be disabled.

icon.title: Icon
icon.content: Set whether to display icons when inserting Index

autoUpdate.title: Auto update
autoUpdate.content:
After opening, the inserted directory will be automatically updated when the document is opened
Note: The automatic update rule is the setting for this insertion, and manual insertion can only change the automatic insertion rule

docBuilder.title: Document Builder [Beta]
docBuilder.content:
When enabled, when only one block is selected and it is a list block, this button will appear. Clicking this button can construct a document hierarchy based on an unordered list hierarchy
Please ensure that there is only a list block in this block to ensure that the document hierarchy is constructed as expected
Note: In the same level directory, files with the same name will not be created repeatedly. Do not operate on formed directory blocks to avoid generating a large number of useless documents.
This feature works normally in the vast majority of cases, but it may still cause unpredictable errors in rare cases. Therefore, it is important to create a snapshot before using it.

subOutlineButton.title: insert sub doc and outline
subOutlineButton.content: Insert the document outline while inserting the sub document directory, And disable automatic updates for this document. Due to slow outline retrieval, automatic updates are not supported when there is an outline. If successful insertion is not displayed for a long time, please be patient and wait

docOutlineButton.title: insert doc outline
docOutlineButton.content: Only the current document outline will be inserted, only affected by the first two settings, and can be repeatedly inserted without updating blocks. It may be used when exporting documents
